content.en: Hybrid vehicle optimization: Researchers have been exploring the use of deep reinforcement learning algorithms to improve energy management in hybrid electric vehicles. These algorithms are being used to optimize fuel economy and enhance the control of powertrain systems. By combining domain knowledge and advanced learning techniques, these algorithms have the potential to significantly improve energy efficiency in hybrid vehicles.
content.da: Hybridbiloptimering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af dybe reinforcement learning algoritmer til at forbedre energistyringen i hybridbiler. Disse algoritmer anvendes til at optimere brændstoføkonomien og forbedre styringen af drivsystemer. Ved at kombinere domæneviden og avancerede læringsteknikker har disse algoritmer potentialet til markant at forbedre energieffektiviteten i hybridbiler.
